long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created this tool to support the web authors, testers and developers to open relevant links (Promotions, Authoring, Testing etc.) at one go without changing URLs manually. It will save time and extra effort. 

Live Copies - We can use the product path and open its editor mode across all respective domains instead of opening one by one.
(Includes Live Sites, Editor Mode, Publish Mode with Representative Regions and All Regions)
Language Copy Promotions - If we want to promote any page then simply we can open all respective domains with a single click.
Utilities - We can simply fill the Checkout Address Form with plugin dummy data.

Tool will be used internally.
